https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/A39VQY8tFeftylL99FH7UCLi5pt.jpg Inuzuka (Hirotaro Honda), who asked about Mamiko (Rei Dan)'s disappeared father, Shinkichi (Ren Osugi), and her lover, Keiichi (Tetta Sugimoto), was murdered. A "letter" from her disappeared father holds the key. Chichi kara no tegami
